name: GHOST PUNISHMENT
description:
GHOST PUNISHMENT - is a simple 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do various levels playing as a Ghost.
The main aim in the game is doing levels collecting definite things (medallions). After collecting all items the entrance to the Ghost's tomb will open.
Do it and you will be on the next level. Be careful because you will face different traps.
Think about your every action, because one wrong step will lead to the death of your hero and the level will have to start again.
Overcome obstacles and this game will definitely seem really cool and interesting.
